title: Different indices, different issues
subtitle: In what contexts are vulnerability indices being talked about on the Web?

sections.html: This is a cross count that shows you how often a range of climate adaptation issue terms (vertical axis) are mentioned together with the names of different indices (horizontal axis) in the EMAPS climate adaptation web corpus. We define togetherness as being mentioned on the same page of a website. In the top row you can read the total number of pages where a given index is mentioned. In the column furthest to the left you can read the total number of pages where a given climate adaptation issue term is mentioned.
